csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <locale>
    <style-options limit-day-ordinals-to-day-1="true"/>
    <date form="text">
      <date-part name="day" suffix=" " form="ordinal"/>
      <date-part name="month" suffix=" "/>
      <date-part name="year"/>
    </date>
  </locale>
  <citation>
    <layout delimiter="; ">
      <group delimiter=" ">
        <text variable="title"/>
        <date variable="issued" prefix="(" suffix=")" form="text" date-parts="year-month-day"/>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
result: Day One (1st June 1965); Day Two (2 June 1965)
